post_text: 🚀 We’re Hiring – Product Manager | Respiratory Portfolio | Product LaunchLooking for a dynamic Product Manager who can drive strategy, execution, and impactful market success. ✅ Strong product management/marketing experience in pharma or healthcare ✅ Expertise in handling launches & portfolio management ✅ Strategic thinker with execution excellence📍 Location: Gurugram 📧 Apply here: Aarti.s@head2hire.comBe a part of a team that’s redefining respiratory care and making a difference in patients’ lives. 💙 hashtag#PharmaHiring hashtag#ProductManager hashtag#RespiratoryPortfolio hashtag#ProductLaunch hashtag#HealthcareInnovation

🚨 We’re hiring a Product Manager at Carrum! 🚨Hey folks! I’m looking for a PM with 2+ years of Product experience, ideally someone who's worked at startups and knows what building from scratch really looks like. My ideal candidate brings: 1. User research: Not “we sent a survey” but “I spent 3 days shadowing users and found insights that changed the roadmap”2. Data analytics: Defining KPIs, digging for insights, and yes, writing your own queries3. MVP mindset: Can spin up MVPs with Google Sheets, Notion, Zapier, or duct tape - and has actually shipped them4. Team management: Lead APMs and align tech, design, ops, and marketing without losing your mind (No, you won’t make PPTs or manage JIRA. We're too busy building.)Who is not my PM:1. You’ve never worked in/with startups2. You’ve only been a scrum master for tasks handed over by manager/business team3. You’re a fresher (we love the young mind energy, but this role needs battle experience)If this sounds like you or someone you’d bet on, apply here: https://lnkd.in/gx49aYNKNote: If your profile is shortlisted, you’ll receive an Ai interview link via email as Round 1 - the interviewer will be an Ai agent.About Carrum: We’re a 14-month-old startup that’s already scaled to a ₹250 Cr+ annualised revenue run rate, profitably. We’re a small team (yes, we hate PPTs too) doing big things with real users, real scale, and real profits.hashtag#productmanagement hashtag#hiring hashtag#startupjobs hashtag#PMhiring hashtag#techcareers

post_text: We’re Hiring: Product ManagerA Product Manager is a senior individual contributor responsible for ensuring a product’s value and viability within a product line. This role involves leading empowered, cross-functional product teams to solve moderate complexity customer problems that align with high value business needs. The Product Manager is accountable for the product’s success, from vision to execution, and collaborates closely with various functions and stakeholders to deliver valuable, viable, usable, and feasible solutions. 📍 Location: Hyderabad, India🎯 Role: Manager - Product Manager, Product & Engineering (10+ years)📩 Apply today: Send your CV to artika.shukla@wowjobs.biz

🌟 We’re Hiring: Associate Product Manager (APM) | Chennai (Work from Office) 🌟Pro-Manage (by Sulekha) is looking for an enthusiastic Associate Product Manager with 1+ years of experience to join our team in Chennai.🔹 What we’re looking for:1–2 years of Product Management experienceStrong understanding of product development lifecycle & agile practicesAbility to translate customer needs into innovative product featuresExcellent communication & collaboration skills📍 Location: Chennai (candidates from Chennai preferred) 📧 Apply: Send your resume to manjusham@sulekha.com 📞 Contact: +91 9600272616Come be a part of building India’s leading AI-powered Marketing SaaS platform 🚀hashtag#Hiring hashtag#ProductManagement hashtag#APM hashtag#ChennaiJobs hashtag#SaaS hashtag#CareerOpportunity
